price: ሁከትም እስከማትገኝ ሃይማኖትም ሁሉ ለአላህ ብቻ እስከሚኾን ድረስ ተጋደሏቸው፡፡ ቢከለከሉም አላህ የሚሠሩትን ሁሉ ተመልካች ነው፡፡
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ كُلُّهُۥ لِلَّهِۚ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bimā yaʿmalūna baṣīrun
